name: Jump Quest (EmptK)
description:
Jump Quest is a shooter-based platformer, aiming to capture (and create a spoof of) the signature epic style of John Wick. 

Players must make quick decisions and must tactically defeat their enemies to escape, all the while considering their immediate cost and consequences.

Developed over a period of about 2 weeks, Jump Quest is my first full game, using Processing java to build a compelling and enjoyable gaming experience.

Download on Windows64 or Linux.
